alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 9:30PM EST until December 22 at 8:12PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River from Elliston to Hazleton. East Fork White River at Seymour. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. The crest on the White River is near Elliston with points downstream steady to slowly rising. The crest on the East Fork White River is near Seymour with flooding expected to end by late Wednesday. Flooding along the White River is expected to last until Christmas for points downstream of Newberry. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Elliston. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, River Road north of CR 150 W in Greene County is flooded. Low agricultural fields flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Monday afternoon by around 1100 AM EST /1030 AM CST/.
